issue.title: [C++] Prototype scalar and array expression types for developing deferred operator algebra
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4782](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4782). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I am beginning to develop a C++ API for describing analytical expressions on scalars, arrays, and tables in the general style of Ibis (https://docs.ibis-project.org/sql.html) which has been used to successfully model SQL relational algebra as well as a broader variety of analytical operations. This is a large project so I'm starting small
